WorkItem.Description:
Apologies if this has already been brought up although I couldn't find any obvious Issue open on the system.
 
Basically, I cannot start up any version of Rawr past version 4.3.0 including the most recent build 4.3.2b. I get the error which I have attached as a JPG. The error just loops and I have to terminate the Rawr process via Task Manager. I am running Windows 7 Ultimate x64 and have not had a problem with previous versions of Rawr. I could get v4.3.2b running briefly but an error occurred when I ran an Optimisation for my Ret Paladin with a certain trinket (the VP one I believe, Skull) and the Optimisation progress just hung, I terminated the process and ever since I just get this error when I try to start, is there a cache I can clear? Might there be a bug with this trinket for Ret?
 
In an attempt to get Rawr working I uninstalled all versions of the .NET Framework and reinstalled v4.0 plus current updates only, numerous restarts etc. I have deleted the Rawr software folder and un-zipped fresh for each startup attempt but still no luck. I am not un-zipping to the Program Files folder. I'm pretty sure there is no other software interfering with Rawr, I run the basic Security Essentials virus scanner.
 
Bizarrely, I can still open and use Rawr 4.3.0 just fine but naturally it is a bit out of date now and I would like to be using the latest version.
 
Thanks.
WorkItem.Summary: Unable to open any Rawr version past 4.3.0
